allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Companies hierarchy view for SuperAdmin and i18n improvements

- Add hierarchical company view for SuperAdmin showing Core and Tenant companies
- Update /api/companies to return tenant info with isCoreTenant flag
- Add forgot-password standalone page with consistent auth styling
- Fix scrollbar-gutter issue on dashboard pages \(stable -> auto\)
- Add companies.currentTenant, coreCompany, tenantCompany translations
- Add companies.stats.tenants translation to all locales
- Complete notification-templates translations for en, de, ar locales
- Update CLAUDE.md with Companies Management documentation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Forgot-password links and hydration mismatch

- Change forgot-password links from /$locale/auth/forgot-password to /auth/forgot-password
- Fix hydration mismatch by conditionally rendering icons with mounted check
- Affected pages: LoginPageClient, AdminLoginPageClient, SuperAdminLoginPageClient, auth/login

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
